data.text: Dhugumaan Waaqni Israaʼeliif,
Ani garuu miilli koo gufachuu gaʼee,
Ani yommuun badhaadhummaa hamootaa argetti,
Isaan hin dhiphatan;
Rakkinni nama biraatti dhufu isaanitti hin dhufu;
Kanaafuu of tuulummaan faaya morma isaanii ti;
Iji isaanii coomee alatti dhiibama;
Isaan ni qoosu; hamminas ni dubbatu;
Afaan isaanii samii falmata;
Kanaafuu sabni gara isaaniitti dachaʼee
Isaanis, “Waaqni akkamitti beekuu dandaʼaa?
Egaa namoonni hamoon akkana;
Yoos ani akkasumaan garaa koo qulqullinaan eeggadhee
Ani guyyaa guutuu dhaʼameera;
Ani utuu, “Akkana nan dubbadha” jedhee jiraadhee
Garuu yommuu ani waan kana hunda hubachuu yaaletti,
Kunis hamma ani iddoo qulqullummaa Waaqaa seenutti ture;
Dhugumaan ati iddoo mucucaataa irra isaan dhaabde;
Isaan akkamiin guutumaan guutuutti sodaadhaan fudhatamanii
Akkuma abjuun yeroo namni hirribaa dammaqutti taʼu sana,
Yommuu lubbuun koo gadditee
ani gowwaa fi wallaalaan ture;
Taʼus ani yeroo hunda si wajjinan jira;
Ati gorsa keetiin na qajeelchita;
Ani samii keessaa eenyunan qaba?
Foon koo fi onneen koo dadhabuu dandaʼu;
Warri sirraa fagoo jiran ni badu;
Akka ani yaadutti garuu Waaqatti dhiʼaachuun gaarii dha;
